newsitem.title: USA: Jayhawk Acceptance to file for Chapter 11.
newsitem.headline: Jayhawk Acceptance to file for Chapter 11.

text.p: Jayhawk Acceptance Corp said Thursday it intends to file a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code and continue operations under the protections afforded by the law.

Jayhawk said that its revolving credit lender has informed the company that it intends to deliver to the company a notice of default and a notice of acceleration under the company's primary revolving credit facility.
